title: Cockpit with Kiox 300. Smart. Sleek. Sporty.
description: Clean lines, hidden cables, and a crisp colour display. The Kiox 300 delivers fitness stats, ride data, and Bluetooth pairing for heart rate tracking. Tilt the stem to suit your riding style — upright or aggressive. With smartphone-linked navigation and easy LED Remote control, it’s built for performance.
